plot: In a future where men no longer exist, two young policewomen must stop Michaela Tomasi, the most dangerous criminal who ever existed.
title: 2038: El futuro de ellas
plot_es: In a future where men no longer exist, two young policewomen must stop Michaela Tomasi, the most dangerous criminal who ever existed.
plot_en: In a future where men no longer exist, two young policewomen must stop Michaela Tomasi, the most dangerous criminal who ever existed.
